snippet.title: Merchant of the Six Kingdoms Full Gameplay Walkthrough Part - 1
snippet.description:
We're playing Merchant of the Six Kingdoms in this video. In this part, we'll be playing through the levels and covering everything that's important.

About the game - Become a medieval merchant and master the arts of bartering, haggling, and investing, Explore 20 markets, barter with 200 characters, and trade in over 1,800 items in a dynamic bartering and haggling system that will challenge and reward.

Title -  Merchant of the Six Kingdoms Full Gameplay Walkthrough Part - 1

Buy the game on the Steam store - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2274480/Merchant_of_the_Six_Kingdoms/

 #keymailer #Merchantofthesixkingdoms
